imagingbook.pub.geometry.fitting

Interface LinearFit2D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineFit2D, ProcrustesFit, ProjectiveFit2D

    public interface LinearFit2D
    Describes a fitter based on a linear transformation model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getError()
      Retrieves the total (squared) error for the estimated fit.
      org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getTransformationMatrix()
      Retrieves the (2 x 3) transformation matrix A, such that y_i = A * x_i (with x_i in homogeneous coordinates).

    • Method Detail

      • getTransformationMatrix

        org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getTransformationMatrix()
        Retrieves the (2 x 3) transformation matrix A, such that y_i = A * x_i (with x_i in homogeneous coordinates).
        Returns:
        the transformation matrix

      • getError

        double getError()
        Retrieves the total (squared) error for the estimated fit.
        Returns:
        the fitting error
